messages.content: I need to cancel a subscription RIGHT NOW. Someone used my card fraudulently to subscribe to your service.
I understand your concern about the fraudulent charge. I'll help you with this right away. Could you please provide the email address associated with the subscription?
Look, I've already wasted enough time trying to figure this out. The email is sahar@aitidbits.com. Just cancel it and refund me immediately!
I'm looking up your subscription now with that email address. To protect your security, could you confirm the last 4 digits of the card that was charged?
Are you kidding me?? It ends in 4891. This is exactly why I hate dealing with customer service. Just endless questions instead of actually HELPING.

I've located your subscription and I'm canceling it immediately. I'm also initiating a refund for the charge of $49.99 to your card ending in 4891. The refund should appear in 3-5 business days. Would you like me to send you an email confirmation of these actions?
3-5 days?! That's ridiculous. I'm reporting this to my bank anyway. Just send the confirmation email and don't expect me to ever use your service again.

I've sent the confirmation email to sahar@aitidbits.com. Your subscription is cancelled and the refund has been processed. I understand your frustration with the refund timeline - unfortunately, this is due to standard bank processing times. If you need any further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out.
